Description: Much of foot and lower wall of large North Ionian bowl; slightly flaring ring foot. Inside glazed with added red and white bands; disc and four circles on underside, glaze on the outside of the foot. Rays around the base of the wall on a white slip. Graffito inscriptions inside and on underside of foot.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.137)
